technology.title: GamePath AI Technology
technology.subtitle: The advanced technology powering your gaming optimization experience

adaptiveRouting.title: Adaptive Routing
adaptiveRouting.description: Our proprietary algorithms analyze network conditions in real-time to find the optimal path for your gaming data.

dynamicPathSelection.title: Dynamic Path Selection
dynamicPathSelection.description: Automatically selects the best network path based on real-time conditions

serverSpecificOptimization.title: Server Optimization
serverSpecificOptimization.description: Custom routing profiles for specific game servers

multiPointRouting.title: Multi-Point Routing
multiPointRouting.description: Uses multiple connection points to ensure the most stable experience

performanceAI.title: Performance AI
performanceAI.description: Machine learning systems that adapt to your hardware configuration and usage patterns for optimal performance.

adaptiveResourceAllocation.title: Adaptive Resource Allocation
adaptiveResourceAllocation.description: Dynamically allocates system resources based on game requirements

gameSpecificProfiles.title: Game-Specific Profiles
gameSpecificProfiles.description: Custom optimization profiles for thousands of popular games

backgroundProcessManagement.title: Background Process Management
backgroundProcessManagement.description: Intelligently manages system processes to prioritize gaming performance

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Access to optimized routes across our worldwide server infrastructure for low-latency gaming anywhere.

security.title: Gaming Security
security.description: Advanced protection features that keep your gaming experience safe and your data private.

ipMasking.title: IP Masking
ipMasking.description: Hide your real IP address to prevent targeting and swatting

antiCheatCompatibility.title: Anti-Cheat Compatibility
antiCheatCompatibility.description: Full compatibility with all major anti-cheat systems

vpn.title: Gaming VPN
vpn.description: Our specialized VPN optimized specifically for gaming performance and security.

geoRestrictionBypass.title: Geo-Restriction Bypass
geoRestrictionBypass.description: Access games and servers from any region regardless of your location

splitTunneling.title: Split Tunneling
splitTunneling.description: Route only game traffic through our optimized network

ispThrottlingPrevention.title: ISP Throttling Prevention
ispThrottlingPrevention.description: Bypass ISP speed limits and traffic shaping for maximum throughput

cta.description: Experience significant latency reduction and performance improvements with our adaptive gaming technology.
